title: This may be the very best synthetic oil made.
description: I have run synthetic since they first started making it waaay back in the early days when Zenex hit the shelves over 40 years ago. Bet you never heard of that. We ran it in our race cars and street machines and saw significant frictional losses and increases in horsepower and mileage. I have studied and played with countless brands since then. Out of all of them, Royal Purple does everything you expect and more. They don't cut corners anywhere. It is now the oil and formula that I use to measure all the rest by.
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023

title: Royal Purple oil
description: In my opinion, this is the best synthetic oil that I have ever used. I live out in the country. The stores in my county don't carry it. I got a better price than when I bought it in the DFW area ,and it arrived in a few days.
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023

title: The Purple
description:
Best oil out there!  Want better gas mileage and higher performance?  Use Royal Purple and see for yourself. I use the 5w20 in a 2005 Dodge Ram 1500 with the 5.7 HEMI. It cost more because your getting more in every quart.  Try it and like me you won't use any thing else in your car or truck.
See Facts that I researched before I started using Royal Purple.  Do the research or try it for youself before you lend judgements on items or comments by those who have.  Of course, buyer always beware.
Research:
The racing markets associate outstanding quality and superior performance with Royal Purple®.  This reputation has been earned through Royal Purple's®  relentless pursuit of lubrication excellence.
Royal Purple® formulates the most advanced lubricants available on the market today.  Synthetic oils enable Royal Purple® to make superior lubricants; however, it is Royal Purple's noncorrosive, proprietary Synerlec® additive technology that provides Royal Purple® lubricants with their amazing performance advantages. Synerlec® additive technology truly is beyond synthetic.
Royal Purple's® Synerlec® additive technology forms a tough, ionic, chemical film on all lubricated parts greatly enhancing the oil's performance.
Royal Purple® manufactures a wide range of high performance, synthetic lubricants for every use from top fuel dragsters to the family car, motorcycles, trucks, RVs and boats. Its industry experts are consistently developing products that outperform leading mineral- and synthetic-based lubricants in performance and protection.
Numerous independent tests document performance gains by using Royal Purple lubricants. The sampling of results below are categorized by the performance gains reported.
[...]
Tests Documenting Horsepower (hp) and / or Torque Gains:
Just In! - Drag Sport magazine: hp gain of 2.5%
D & D Performance Enterprises: hp gain of 1.2%, torque gain of 1.3%
Diesel World magazine: hp gain of 3.2%
GM High-Tech Performance magazine: hp gain of 10+, torque gain of nearly 12 ft-lbs
Oklahoma State University:  diesel engine gain of 2.8% hp
Sport Truck magazine: hp gain of 5%, torque gain of 12 lb-ft
Tests Documenting Fuel Economy Improvements:
Diesel World: fuel economy gain of 10% or 1.7 mpg
fordtruckworld.com: fuel economy gain of 7.4% or 1.1 mpg
North Carolina State University: gasoline engine fuel economy gain of 2.5% to 5.0% and diesel engine fuel economy gain of 1.5% to 3.7%
Oklahoma State University: fuel economy gain of 4.4%
Test Documenting Reduced Engine Wear:
Insight Services:  wear reduced by 80% and oil change intervals extended from once per race to every 3 races
Tests Documenting Reduced Engine Heat:
Longview Inspection: Max-Cycle reduced operating temperatures 24°F - 44°F
Tests Documenting Reduced Emissions:
North Carolina State University: diesel engine emissions reduced 17%-34% and gasoline engine emissions reduced 29% (city) and 62% (highway)
Oklahoma State University: diesel engine emissions reduced 22%
[...]
[...]
I should have included this in the first review.
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2009

title: Best daily driver oil on the market
description: What else can I say? This is the best oil on the market for your road vehicles.
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023

title: Actually improved MPG...slightly.
description: My car averaged 19.5 MPG for the first 18 months of ownership, using name brand synthetic oil. Shortly after changing to this oil, that went to 19.7 and 3 months later raised to 19.9. Nothing else had changed- same daily trips to work and back as always- so I think the oil did it. Still only about 7 "extra" miles per week, but in a year's time it's like a free tankful of fuel. So this oil more than pays for itself compared to the top quality oils I had used previously.
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
